name: Narasimman Sairam
body:
I am a final year student pursuing Masters in Computer Science at New York University - Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences.

My interests lies in the field of Software Development and Web development in large scale distributed systems.

[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/narasimmansairam)

## PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE (4 YEARS AND 6 MONTHS)
### Student Research Assistant May 2015 - Present

NYU Stern Urbanization project (Sponsored by UNITED NATIONS) - New York University
PHP | Web development | AJAX | CodeIgniter framework |
- As the only Technology Developer in the team working on a global program of research conducted at 200 cities, preparing for HABITAT III – the United Nations conference, I’m building surveys and websites in ten global languages.

## Software Development Engineer Mar 2013 – Dec 2014
### Pegasystems Inc., Bangalore, India

Java | JavaScript | HTML | CSS | Handlebar JS | Jquery | REST web services | Agile Development | Scrum |
- As a member of UI Engineering team at Pega, we designed and implemented a new web application that supports PRPC application architecture and infrastructure in offline mode using latest UI technologies.
- Developed Pega Applications for IPhone, IPad and Android Mobile and Tablets working across time zones with distributed teams in Cambridge, US and Krakow, Poland.

## Software Development Engineer July 2010 – Feb 2013
### United Online Software Development (India) Pvt. Ltd., Hyderabad, India

Java | JSP | Struts | Hibernate | DOJO JavaScript | MySQL | JUnit Testing | Agile Development | Linux |
- As a primary developer of Mypoints.com, I developed Java based components for e-commerce ad server and mass mailer that manages ads and sends out deals to the members.
- Member of the core web development team revamping Mypoints.com website to improve user experience by redesigning user interfaces and adding social sharing APIs.
